sense.name: give interlinear explanations or citations for text
sense.examples: Montalvo also glossed the Fuero Real, published in 1500. Some of those who glossed the work had English cases in mind. Make sure to gloss all the quotes in your paper.

sense.name: shine by rubbing or painting
sense.examples: Gloss the buttons before putting them on the jacket.

sense.name: give a deceptive explanation for; cover up
sense.examples: Can a magazine cover gloss over a scandal? Huckabee tries to gloss over Arkansas record. Don't gloss pollution effects since they're plain to see.
